{"draw":0,"recordsTotal":188,"recordsFiltered":188,"data":[{"id":1,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198199662405 (ExtremAdn)","alts":null,"description":"[b]Type of appeal[/b] [i]SteamRep tag removal/downgrade[/i] [b]What was your in-game name when you got banned?[/b] [i]ExtremAdn[/i] [b]When did it happen?[/b] [i]300~ days[/i] [b]What's the specified reason?[/b] [i]I added a user (advicebanana) to buy his knife and I try to scam him with midleman metod coping his friend profile with my second acound ([url]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198142325808/[/url]) trying to trade me her knife.  Here the link to the report: [url=http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/8389-76561198199662405-extremadn-76561198142325808-antim.html]76561198199662405 (ExtremAdn), 76561198142325808 (antim)[/url][/i] [b]Why do you think you should be unbanned?[/b] [i]First that i need to say is sorry,  I would also like to apologize for my bad English. There have been almost 300 days since it happened, at that time I was very resentful because I had spent my pay of one month in a AWP Hyperbeast and a guy scam me... I was stupid and in this time I could not think think of a better way to recover that weapon that scamming another user, very serious mistake from my part... I think to this day I have retrained enough and I've seen that problems are not solved causing problems for other users. I am quite sorry for what I did and I would like to return to the community with a clean image. After the death of my grandmother I see things differently, very differently.. I hope you will forgive me and my sincerest apologies to the user "advicebanana" for what I try to do that day. I can assure you that I have changed, I know that all mod here listen that all the days but Its true... Again, Im sorry for my acts. I am still ashamed to this very day. [u]Questions of [/u][/i][u][b][url=http://forums.f-o-g.eu/members/tio-jose-das-vacas.html]Tio José das Vacas[/url] [/b]of last post:[/u] [b]My alt acounds:[/b] 1.- [i][url]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198142325808/[/url] 2.- [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198250988412]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/[/url][/i][url=https://steamid.io/lookup/76561198250988412]76561198250988412[/url] [b]How many people have you tried to scam?[/b] I dont remenber exactly but I add like 5-6  [b]How many people have you impersonated with your alt?[/b] I think like 3-4 (I dont know exactly) [b]Have you ever been successful at scamming? If yes, how many time and how many people.[/b] No, fortunately [b]Why is your alt with the name "FREE Coins!!! CODE: TAKECOINS"?[/b] That my code of a gambing site "CSGOPolygon" and use it to win some skins without adversely affecting other users in the steam comunity. [i]Best Regards, Ander Duro (ExtremAdn)​[/i]  ","evidence":"There is no evidence this is a change of hearth. Random ScreenShot (https://files.f-o-g.eu/ad0f39f072ad34gf3fd11a9e870db8a0)","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":596,"locked":1,"creator_id":19,"modificator_id":19,"created_at":"25.07.2016 20:43:14","updated_at":"2016-07-30 00:40:10","state":"Rejected","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas

I love playing on trade servers.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":413,"locked":1,"creator_id":28,"modificator_id":28,"created_at":"05.08.2016 04:03:13","updated_at":"2016-08-13 21:24:40","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":6,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198179679353 (K3ro)","alts":null,"description":"Well,I tried this method named middleman scam with one of my friends after both of us were scammed,we tried like three or four times with fail as a result,so I abandoned it and restarted trading,when I saw that I couldn't use tf2.wh anymore,that because my name history was still there and I got reported on FoG and I admit that I impersonated the middleman I7|JING,abusing his profile and nickname. I want to get unbanned only to restart trading,since I have around 50000-60000 points remaining from my last trades on tf2.wh. I got banned 95 days ago on [i]11.05.2016 My appeal on the last forum:   http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/12240-steamrep-tag-removal-downgrade-ban-appeal-k3ro.html[/i]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":709,"locked":1,"creator_id":42,"modificator_id":42,"created_at":"14.08.2016 10:18:11","updated_at":"2016-08-26 21:08:51","state":"Rejected","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Ninja Otter With A Taco
"},{"id":7,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198219157875 (dank memay)","alts":null,"description":"[i]I'm truly sorry and I admint I did try and scam but I've never scammed anyone. I can show all the proof if needed I got scammed twice and I recently bought a Butterfly Knife | Stained. I then wanted more, but ended up in this current state :/. I felt kind of crappy while doing it and thankfully never scammed anyone. I now just got scammed again and have learned a lesson. I apologize for trying to scam and would really like to be unbanned. Why should we consider unbanning you?: I only wanted more money and me being dumb and young I only saw one way, to scam.. And now that I've seen what can happend I feel crappy and never want to do it again. What have you changed since then?: Well first to not try and scam and claim that I have a vault.. Do you have any alt accounts?: Yes, this and another one that's listed on steamrep. How many people you tried to scam?: Around 15. Have you ever been successful in scamming?: Nope.[/i]","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/7g4gb3f1d42gcg0g453a2fc26580db5c https://files.f-o-g.eu/88b73547dgf4a96d0fbf9cad3gcdaa61 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":342,"locked":1,"creator_id":45,"modificator_id":45,"created_at":"15.08.2016 15:43:13","updated_at":"2016-08-23 23:38:49","state":"Rejected","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":8,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198101909159 (Rain)","alts":null,"description":"About a year ago I tried to scam someone and failed. Sense then I have apologozed to the person and tried to make things better between us. Sense then I havent tried to scam anyone at all and have helped a few people from not being scammed themself's. Im hoping to have a second chance and be unban.  sincerely, Rain","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/e4g23c http://files.f-o-g.eu/0a72af","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":239,"locked":1,"creator_id":41,"modificator_id":41,"created_at":"15.08.2016 19:11:01","updated_at":"2016-09-07 18:40:10","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":10,"type":"Friend/Family - My account was abused by a family member or friend","appellant":"76561198169471900 (The Wandering Pyro)","alts":null,"description":"I have no cluewhat or how this happened, but I have never bet on any server but a server called police fortress 2. I see the evidence and I understand that it is all stacked against me, so, Ireally dont careabout whatever server or anything I was banned on, but Ii care about having a steamrep scammer tag. so I dont know howto contact the person who reported this, so if any admins could help me out so I can pay what I owe, which I guess was 1 key and 15 ref, and then could Ii please get this tag removed? thanks, and hopefully thanks for the help!","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":388,"locked":1,"creator_id":52,"modificator_id":52,"created_at":"19.08.2016 07:07:56","updated_at":"2016-08-24 18:27:37","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":11,"type":"Friend/Family - My account was abused by a family member or friend","appellant":"76561198165312621 (Byali)","alts":null,"description":"I haven't had access to my account in over a month as I have been gone on vacation with my family in Mexico, I gave my cousin access to my account because he wanted to play some of my games and because I had nice csgo skins he like to use them, I had no control over what happened to my account or what he did on my account, please look this over and consider lifting the ban because I would like to be able to trade with no problems regarding my steamrep status over something I had no control of. I don't know how to prove this, the only way is to show proof of my travel history which includes private information that I don't feel comfortable sharing on the internet, please consider this as it was not me who has access to my account at the time of the incident I was banned for","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":61,"locked":1,"creator_id":54,"modificator_id":54,"created_at":"21.08.2016 05:27:44","updated_at":"2016-08-21 22:43:55","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

Sorry guys but you got wrong, he is not my alt, im not using any alts. Can you please remove the ban ? ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":725,"locked":1,"creator_id":64,"modificator_id":64,"created_at":"25.08.2016 15:53:02","updated_at":"2016-08-26 15:59:56","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":14,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198144171296 (Dimitri)","alts":null,"description":"[i]It was 1 Year ago, I just found out about csgo gambling when i thought why not try my luck, and I was extremly lucky, won alot of money, so I went on this site called csgoshuffle back in the day, and after winning a pot I falsely accepted an offer which ended up beeing an offer for my Items instead of the items I won, I was really upset about this considering it was around 500$, and I got to upset I tried to do it myself which was a terrible mistake, It didnt end up working either, I tried for like 1 hour and never did it again, and I am really truly sorry I tried to scam anyone, I was just really upset and I never tried scamming since[/i]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":378,"locked":1,"creator_id":70,"modificator_id":70,"created_at":"28.08.2016 16:51:56","updated_at":"2016-08-28 17:30:59","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":17,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198089757674 (Barney#CASHED OUT)","alts":null,"description":" I have been reported for intent to scam [url]https://f-o-g.trade/reports/158[/url]. i had no intention to scam anyone i did it because one of guy named harley quinns requested me to do as i was banned by admin edward in cash rep group.the guy named harly quinns added me and requested me to do because he told me that admin is banning everyone wantedly this guy took my weakness as my advantage since i was bit stressed and tensed i changed my name and did as he told.i am here to provied any evidence and proof you request.i am ashamed of myself sir and to prove i have changed i will be donating funds to various websites like FoG,Steamrep,Reddit and so on.ill try to be part of these communities to make this place better.and ill even assure if anyone come against me with the proof that i scammed them ill refund their items/paypal.give me a chance to prove me that i have changed and you will not regret it.i hope the result will be in my favour regards, ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":642,"locked":1,"creator_id":68,"modificator_id":68,"created_at":"29.08.2016 14:04:51","updated_at":"2016-08-31 18:45:50","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":22,"type":"Hijacked - My account was abused by hijacker","appellant":"76561198171851973 (LEL)","alts":null,"description":"Hello this account was hijacked and i contacted to fog administrator yesterday , i said to him that i will recover my account and i wanted to remove steamrep ban on this account and i asked for help to him and he said to make an appeal , i made it but i got ban on my second account too :/ . Yesterday i contacted to steamsupport and they recovered my account now i want to remove ban from my both account  https://f-o-g.trade/appeals/21 -this was previous appeal","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/dffdf6b4cg8cb268f50e6b89e99eb859 http://files.f-o-g.eu/ac8fgd4gcd4e53500c6a150gggd0cg94","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":599,"locked":1,"creator_id":90,"modificator_id":90,"created_at":"10.09.2016 08:58:02","updated_at":"2016-09-10 17:37:27","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

Scamming has been a very bad part to the trading community and i'm sorry. If i'm not getting unbanned, I understand. But it sucks now that I can't trade. I feel sorry for everything that I have done. I hope that everyone can forgive me. ","evidence":"The only evidence here is that I am being honest about my self These are all of my accounts https://files.f-o-g.eu/806cd54be32bc33bae5ffgdcg8feffc2 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":546,"locked":1,"creator_id":91,"modificator_id":91,"created_at":"10.09.2016 23:57:16","updated_at":"2016-09-13 13:41:31","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":27,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198170421719 (Zenith)","alts":null,"description":"It's been 250 days since my last incident with scammers and I first want to say how truly sorry I am for assisting a scammer with tf2 gambling. Ever since I got the caution tag, I've eliminated myself from all gambling websites (even CSGO) and unfriended anyone involved with the situation that I had dealt with in the past. I promise not to do this act of curelty ever again. I noticed about 20 days ago that the link to my report has been so old that I can't access the link to the report and it has been archived. I was wondering if this meant that my Caution tag can be appealed or not in a sense that it will be accepted since the report was archived and no longer accesible. Evidence of the link not working and the report possibly being archived down below.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/c6ad7g2ba6c79d3a39a0554266ef6c7f https://files.f-o-g.eu/a4c046347gd0ab787affe2c0fdf59765 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":601,"locked":1,"creator_id":98,"modificator_id":98,"created_at":"14.09.2016 21:15:02","updated_at":"2016-10-06 21:45:39","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":30,"type":"Missing - Evidence is missing or not enough","appellant":"76561198306075877 (zeeko683)","alts":null,"description":"Hi i`ve been reported by [url=https://f-o-g.trade/profiles/76561197983311223]advicebanana[/url] because i impersonated a admin (he says). the admin was:Jessica (13 YO Girl) ⇋HG-A⇌m, and i think he doesnt have enough proof of it. in the evidence thing (my english sucks) i will send the links is the proof he send you. the first link is my profile. the second one is my recent names. and the third one is the admin. the problem with the evidence is in the second link, if you click on it i dont see the name: was:Jessica (13 YO Girl) ⇋HG-A⇌m. and if that is the only proof i dont think that is enough. but that is not for me to decide. thanks for reading  ","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/ce760ea1711a82ece7eg4g0b9ee91d49 https://files.f-o-g.eu/f4abfa1efbggcg28dd50fb38bdba7cga https://files.f-o-g.eu/c92b0fb4f424e08gf19gf4c4f0d1cec4","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":219,"locked":1,"creator_id":102,"modificator_id":102,"created_at":"16.09.2016 17:40:57","updated_at":"2016-09-19 16:54:50","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

If you look i havent been accused of any scamming attempts or paticipating in any suspicious activity. i hope this helps my cause. will get in contact with victim asap","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":268,"locked":1,"creator_id":113,"modificator_id":113,"created_at":"24.09.2016 12:12:58","updated_at":"2016-09-27 18:55:27","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

"},{"id":36,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198073117862 (BobCat)","alts":null,"description":"Yesterday, I went and heavy boxed Killer for items, my spec killstreak baby face for his genuine ap-sap. all the evdence he gave was true, but he left out the fact that the trade was sent, but waiting on mobile confrimation I have sent Killer a friend request, and given him my baby face and some extra scrap Killer can confirm this, as well as looking in my inventory history can (steam was glitching out so i could not snap a pic of it)  ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":138,"locked":1,"creator_id":114,"modificator_id":114,"created_at":"24.09.2016 21:35:40","updated_at":"2016-09-25 21:22:27","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

I lost, and I ran shortly after. I have repaid @Killer , and I would like to have my tag downgraded, as I made a stupid mistake. I'm sorry, and I would like to learn from my mistakes in the future.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/9f46da3eaddd4feb448ccb52171d6fe8 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":227,"locked":1,"creator_id":119,"modificator_id":119,"created_at":"30.09.2016 20:58:05","updated_at":"2016-10-04 22:00:36","state":"Rejected","assignee":"

I hope you can understand my situation best regards, Lubor","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/f1gafg117d70a9b733bfe846gf814b5e https://files.f-o-g.eu/fb4ga2555f59d451abee068dca9ag25g ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":5,"views":418,"locked":1,"creator_id":126,"modificator_id":126,"created_at":"08.10.2016 14:33:58","updated_at":"2016-10-10 15:49:41","state":"Rejected","assignee":"
